post.description: Creates a network connectivity configuration (NCC), which provides stable IP CIDR blocks that are associated with your workspace. You can assign an NCC to one or more workspaces in the same region. Once assigned, the workspace serverless compute resources use the same set of stable IP CIDR blocks to access your resources.
